title: Yankees fans ripped for chanting 'Uber!' at Twins' starting pitcher
text:
CLOSE

A group of New York Yankees fans at Saturday's Game 2 of the their team's series with the Minnesota Twins apparently thought they were being really clever with a chant at Twins starting pitcher Randy Dobnak.

But here's the thing - they weren't clever at all because their chant was just disrespectful.

The fans could be heard chanting "Uber! Uber'" at Dobnak because last year he worked as an Uber driver while he was in the minors. Making fun of someone for making an honest living and earning some extra money while they chase their dream doesn't seem all that clever to me.

description: Fans of the New York Yankees were ripped on social media Saturday night after chanting 'Uber!' at Minnesota Twins pitcher Randy Dobnak.
